name: 幻梦·Fantasy
intro:
幻梦·Fantasy

《幻梦·Fantasy》

- Ambient 氛围音乐

- Mixed & Designed by Yifei Zheng (镜决)

Universe In The Eye

Fantasy In The Dream

一眼一世界

一梦一幻境

如梦幻泡影

如露亦如电

------------------------------------------------------------------

第一梦

The First Fantasy

反反复复

氤氲靡靡

为什么找不到出路？

Everything is in vague.

Why can't I find a way out?

------------------------------------------------------------------

第二梦

The Second Fantasy

似乎有一些什么

既相似而不同

上一秒的我还是此刻的我么？

Similar but different.

Was it the same ego in the last second?

2018.1.23
